[[1971â72 Mersin Ä°dmanyurdu season|1971â72]] |} The [[1970â71 Turkish First Football League|1970â71]] season was the fourth season of [[Mersin Ä°dmanyurdu]] (MÄ°Y) football team in [[Turkish First Football League]], the first level division in [[Turkey]]. They finished eleventh in the league. They also took place in [[Turkish Cup]] and eliminated at second round. Mehmet Karamehmet was president. Erol Tarhan was general captain. Mahir Turhan, Sezai Sak, Orhan Mutlu were executive committee member. ==Pre-season== MÄ°Y opened new srason on 10.08.1970. Preparation games: * 23.08.1970 - Bursaspor-MÄ°Y. * 05.09.1970 - Galatasaray-MÄ°Y: 2-0. Saturday 17:00. Ali Sami Yen Stadium, Ä°stanbul. Referees: Nazif Oturgan, Necmettin Ãakan, Adnan PaksÃ¼t. ''Galatasaray'': Nihat (Yasin), Ekrem, Tuncay, Muzaffer, AydÄ±n, Ahmet, ErgÃ¼n, UÄur, GÃ¶kmen, Metin, Ayhan. Goals: Metin 10', GÃ¶kmen 40'. Coach: CoÅkun ÃzarÄ±. ''MÄ°Y'': Fikret, Taner, B.Erol, Cihat, Mustafa, Refik, AkÄ±n, Ayhan, Osman, Ä°brahim, Alp, Muharrem. Coach: BÃ¼lent Giz."Galatasaray is determined, they beated Mersin 2-0 too". [http://thumb.gazetearsivi.milliyet.com.tr//ML/1970/09/06/ML19700906001100819.gif Mersin'i de 2-0 yenen Galatasaray rakip tanÄ±mÄ±yor]. Milliyet gazete arÅivi, 06.09.1970, p. 8. Retrieved on 09.09.2010. {{tr icon}}. ==1970â71 league participation== [[Turkish First Football League|First League]] was played with 16 teams in its 13th season, [[1970â71 Turkish First Football League|1970â71]]. Last two teams relegated to [[Turkish Second Football League|Second League]] [[1971â72 Turkish Second Footbal League|1971â72]]. Mersin Ä°Y became 11th with 11 wins, and [[Osman ArpacÄ±oÄlu]] was most scorer player with 14 goalsMersin Ä°dmanyurdu S.K. History [http://www.mersinidmanyurdu.org.tr/tr/icerik/7-tarihce.html Mersin Ä°dman Yurdu S.K.
